segments.text: I notice the woman so absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is creating such a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad she hasn't turned off the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, and she might slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool is tilting dangerously backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be really bad for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting with her hand out seems so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting a treat, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden view outside makes the inside chaos feel worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the family if this leads to an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes on the counter could tumble too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene turned hazardous tugs at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR
